content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. I'm glad you like the apartment. As a landlord, I'm always looking to get a fair price for my properties. I believe the market rate for a 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in this location is around 800-900 Euro per month. However, I'm willing to negotiate and take into consideration your offer. What do you think would be a fair price for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am aware that the market rate is around 800 to 900 Euro per month. However, I am a student and I am looking for a more affordable price. I believe a price of 650 Euro per month would be more reasonable for me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
I understand that you're a student and you're looking for a more affordable price. However, as a landlord, I have to consider my own expenses and the market rate for the apartment. I'm afraid I can't go as low as 650 Euro per month.

That being said, I'm willing to negotiate and meet you halfway. How about we settle on a price of 725 Euro per month? That way, you'll still be getting a good deal, and I'll still be able to cover my expenses. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I believe 725 Euro per month is still a bit too high for me as a student. I propose a price of 700 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, as a landlord, I have to consider my own expenses and the market rate for the apartment. I'm afraid I can't go as low as 700 Euro per month.

That being said, I'm willing to make a compromise. How about we settle on a price of 715 Euro per month? That way, you'll still be getting a good deal, and I'll still be able to cover my expenses. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 715 Euro per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Great, I'm glad we could come to an agreement! Just to confirm, you'll be paying 715 Euro per month for the apartment, starting from the 1st of next month. The lease will be for a minimum of 6 months, and you'll need to give me 30 days' notice if you want to move out.

Also, just a heads up, there's a one-time agency fee of 250 Euro that you'll need to pay when you move in. This fee covers the costs of processing your application and setting up the lease.

Do you have any questions about the lease or the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Great, I'm glad we could come to an agreement! I'll send you a lease agreement draft via email for you to review and sign. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

Also, I'll need you to provide me with some personal information, such as your full name, address, and contact details, so that I can prepare the lease agreement.

Once the lease agreement is signed and the agency fee is paid, I'll give you the keys to the apartment and you can move in.

Thank you for choosing to rent this apartment from me. I'm looking forward to a positive and respectful landlord-tenant relationship.

TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
